TopicTitle: Any mods that improve/extend the xp system?

Articles.Content: Well I "know" it makes ksp more "gamey" but are there any mods that "extend" the xp system? I could see some mod that let only experienced kerbals "use" advanced features of mechjeb, or even give other boosts to your spacecraft?

I've never seen such a mod. I've seen ones that change who can do what, but never one that adds things to do.

Unless you count things like EPLP which gives engineers bonus powers when building craft off-world.

I have a patch that adds things (partial patch) - like this?

Spoiler

@EXPERIENCE_TRAIT[Pilot]:Needs[SQUAD]:AFTER[Squad]
{
    %EFFECT[FuelUsage]
    {
        %modifiers = 0.99, 0.97, 0.94, 0.90, 0.85
    }    
    
    %EFFECT[EnginePower]
    {
        %modifiers = 1.01, 1.03, 1.06, 1.10, 1.15
    }
    
    %EFFECT[FullVesselControlSkill]
    {
        %modifiers = 1.01, 1.03, 1.06, 1.10, 1.15
    }
    
    %EFFECT[AutopilotSkill]
    {
        %modifiers = 1.01, 1.03, 1.06, 1.10, 1.15
    }
    
    %EFFECT[MaxThrottle]
    {
        %modifiers = 1.01, 1.03, 1.06, 1.10, 1.15
    }
}
